function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"De-identified data on malaria cases","Impact":"Potential for privacy breaches and re-identification of individuals","Mitigation":"Use of advanced anonymization techniques and strict access controls","Technologies":"Anonymization software, encryption, access controls","People":"Patients, individuals residing in affected areas","Owner":"Data protection authorities, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Use of geolocated data for mapping malaria risk","Impact":"Risk of revealing sensitive location information","Mitigation":"Aggregation of data, spatial obfuscation, and controlled access to detailed maps","Technologies":"Spatial obfuscation tools, access controls, data aggregation","People":"Residents of the mapped areas","Owner":"Public health authorities, research organizations"},{"Description":"Transmission season data collection","Impact":"Potential exposure of field workers to infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Provision of protective gear, vaccination of field workers, and adherence to safety protocols","Technologies":"Protective gear, vaccination technology, safety protocols","People":"Field workers, healthcare workers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, research institutions"}]}
